At the end of the day,

That five year journey is

When I first got there,

things you can do with AI,

you're taking data, and
millions and millions
of data points from all over the world

I think reinforcement.

The purpose and value of the

data told you one thing,
before the pandemic,

And it's really all powered by AI and ML.

the power that we've built
